abstract: New York City police officer identified only by badge number testifies at trial of undercover detective Wojciech Braszczok, who is accused of participating in 2013 motorcycle gang assault on driver on West Side Highway; says Braszczok told him that he had been present during attack but was afraid to intervene or call police.
lead_paragraph: A colleague testified about a conversation with Wojciech Braszczok the day before motorcyclists chased a driver on the West Side Highway and later beat him.

headline.main: Detective Accused in Assault Expected Mayhem in Bikers’ Tour, Colleague Testifies
headline.print_headline: Colleague Says Detective Accused in Bikers’ Attack Expected Mayhem

snippet: A colleague testified about a conversation with Wojciech Braszczok the day before motorcyclists chased a driver on the West Side Highway and later beat him.
